content: User limit exceeded. To proceed to the next step, please adjust the number of users or increase the {{productName}} user limit.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when the number of users exceeds the licensed limit. It prompts the user to adjust the number of users or increase the product user limit to proceed. This text appears on a Users Info Block component in the Portal Settings page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Chcete-li přejít k dalšímu kroku" is a bit literal and clunky. A more natural phrasing would be something like "Pro pokračování..." or "Abyste mohli pokračovat..."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abyste mohli pokračovat, upravte počet uživatelů nebo zvyšte limit uživatelů {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'adjust the number of users' is overly literal. A more natural Greek phrasing would be to suggest reducing the number of users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μειώστε τον αριθμό των χρηστών

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'αυξήστε το όριο χρηστών του {{productName}}' can be more elegantly phrased. It's a bit wordy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: αυξήστε το όριο χρηστών για το {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ole hyvä ja" is a bit formal for this context. While grammatically correct, it makes the tone overly polite.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Simply use "Muokkaa" or "Vaihda" instead of "Ole hyvä ja muokkaa".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "modificare il numero di utenti" is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be "ridurre il numero di utenti" (reduce the number of users) or "diminuire il numero di utenti" (decrease the number of users). While 'modificare' isn't wrong, it's less precise in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ridurre il numero di utenti o diminuire il numero di utenti

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ເພີ່ມຂີດຈຳກັດຜູ້ໃຊ້ {{productName}}" is a literal translation and could be improved to convey the meaning more naturally in Lao. A better phrasing would be something along the lines of "ເພີ່ມຈຳນວນຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້ຂອງ {{productName}}" or "ເພີ່ມກຳນົດຈຳນວນຜູ້ໃຊ້ຂອງ {{productName}}".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເພີ່ມຈຳນວນຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້ຂອງ {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To proceed to the next step' is overly literal and sounds awkward in Portuguese. A more natural phrasing would be 'Para continuar' or 'Para avançar'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para continuar para a próxima etapa, ajuste o número de usuários ou aumente o limite de usuários do {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'aumente o limite de usuários do {{productName}}' is technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more fluid option would be 'aumente o limite de usuários do {{productName}}' (remove 'do').
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para continuar para a próxima etapa, ajuste o número de usuários ou aumente o limite de usuários do {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To proceed to the next step' is too literal. A more natural phrasing in Portuguese would be 'Para continuar' or 'Para avançar'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para continuar para a próxima etapa, ajuste o número de usuários ou aumente o limite de usuários do {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "definiți numărul de utilizatori" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey 'adjust the number of users'. It suggests defining rather than modifying.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Reduceți numărul de utilizatori sau creșteți limita de utilizatori {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word order in the suggested correction could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Creșteți limita de utilizatori {{productName}} sau reduceți numărul de utilizatori.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Превышен лимит пользователя" could be improved for clarity. While technically correct, it sounds a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing might be "Достигнут лимит пользователей" or "Превышен максимальное количество пользователей."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Достигнут лимит пользователей

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'увеличьте лимит пользователей {{productName}}' is slightly repetitive. 'Увеличьте лимит {{productName}}' would be more concise and readable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: увеличьте лимит {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්' is repeated and potentially awkward. While technically correct, it's a bit redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rewording to something like 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයා' or 'භාවිතකරුවා' depending on the precise meaning. A more fluent phrasing is generally preferred.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'ඊළඟ පියවරට යාමට' is grammatically correct, but could be more concise and natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ඊළඟ පියවරට යන්න' or a more direct construction depending on the overall tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්' makes the sentence feel longer than necessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Restructure the sentence to avoid repetition where possible. Perhaps rephrase to 'සීමාව ඉක්මවා ඇති නිසා, පරිශ්‍රීලකයා ගණන වෙනස් කරන්න හෝ...'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Limit používateľa prekročený' is a technically correct translation of 'User limit exceeded,' but it sounds somewhat formal and less natural in Slovak. A more natural phrasing would be 'Prekročený je limit používateľov' or 'Dosiahli ste maximálny počet používateľov'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prekročený je limit používateľov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Če želite nadaljevati na naslednji korak" is a bit clunky in Slovenian. A more natural phrasing would be "Za nadaljevanje na naslednji korak" or "Če želite nadaljevati z naslednjim korakom".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Za nadaljevanje na naslednji korak

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable {{productName}} is present in the English and Slovenian versions. Consistency in formatting should be maintained.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, but consistency ensured.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The possessive suffix '-а' in '{{productName}}-а' is grammatically correct but might sound slightly awkward depending on the product name. Consider a more fluent phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like '{{productName}}' directly, or rephrasing to avoid the possessive suffix if possible (e.g., 'повеца́јте ограничење за кориснике {{productName}}').

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The possessive suffix '-a' is unnecessary and awkward after '{{productName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Korisnički limit prekoračen. Da biste prešli na sledeći korak, prilagodite broj korisnika ili povećajte korisnički limit {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Da biste prešli na sledeći korak' is grammatically correct, it's a bit formal and could be slightly improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Korisnički limit prekoračen. Da biste nastavili, prilagodite broj korisnika ili povećajte korisnički limit {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'простору {{productName}}' (space {{productName}}) is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the intended meaning. It implies a physical space rather than a product's user limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Збільште ліміт користувачів для {{productName}}.
